tool_description: Estimates procurement lead times based on supplier historical performance, product characteristics, and current market conditions.

supplier_id.description: Supplier ID to estimate lead time for

product_category.description: Product category for lead time estimation

seasonal_period.description: Current seasonal period: Q1, Q2, Q3, Q4

rush_order.description: Whether this is a rush order requiring expedited processing

error_messages: Supplier not found: The specified supplier_id is not recognized in the system.
Invalid product category: The product_category is not in the system catalog.
Invalid order quantity: order_quantity must be positive.
Invalid seasonal period: seasonal_period must be one of [Q1, Q2, Q3, Q4] or null.
Insufficient historical data: Not enough historical orders for reliable lead time estimation.
usage: Provide supplier_id, product_category, and order_quantity. Optionally specify seasonal_period and set rush_order flag for expedited estimates.

reliability_score.description: Supplier reliability score (0-1) for this product category

historical_orders_count.description: Number of historical orders used in estimation
